title: Shaming the Billionaire's Son
description: Second chances come at a cost and super-ambitious Renee Mason is learning it's not easy to work side-by-side with someone who hates you - especially when the feeling isn't mutual.My best friend warned me about taking the hot guy's photo for my shame post. But how could I resist? He was multi-tasking while driving. It was also kind of cute since it involved an apple but that was beside the point. It didn't take long for me to realize I'd made a grave error. The post went viral within minutes and threatened to ruin everything I'd worked so hard to achieve. How was I to know he was the son of the woman I dreamed of working for?
author: Sharon Sue Thorn
